s: Plus, if they wanted to continue growing, why not sell things online with one of the most trust brands? “Amazon is going to open up and unlock an enormous amount of value for fashion brands,” Dee says. New Republic built an ecommerce storefront to mirror their web experience.

s: A magazine of national politics and culture, The New Republic seeks to restore flagging liberal confidence. In this age of resurgent right-wing reaction, bigotry, and culture warfare, the first principles of our public life demand to be forcefully articulated and defended.
